languages.text: "Да что ты такое несешь? Даже одна мысль о подобном..." {n}Голос проктора звенит яростью, железные пальцы впиваются в ошейник Глейто.{/n} "Больное ты отродье!"
"What are you talking about? The very suggestion—" {n}The Proctor's voice resounds with fury. His steely fingers dig into Glaito's collar.{/n} "You sick degenerate!"
languages.original_text: "Да что ты такое несешь? Даже одна мысль о подобном..." {n}Голос проктора звенит яростью, железные пальцы впиваются в ошейник Глейто.{/n} "Больное ты отродье!"

traits.locale_text: "What are you on about? "The very suggestion—" {n}The Proctor's voice resounds with fury. His steely fingers dig into Glaito's collar.{/n} "You sick degenerate!"
"What are you on about? "The very suggestion—" {n}The Proctor's voice resounds with fury. His steely fingers dig into Glaito's collar.{/n} "You sick degenerate!"
"What are you talking about? The very suggestion—" {n}The Proctor's voice resounds with fury. His steely fingers dig into Glaito's collar.{/n} "You sick degenerate!"
"What are you talking about? The very suggestion—" {n}The Proctor's voice resounds with fury. His steely fingers dig into Glaito's collar.{/n} "You sick degenerate!"
"What are you talking about? The very suggestion—" {n}The Proctor's voice resounds with fury. His steely fingers dig into Glaito's collar.{/n} "You sick degenerate!"
"What are you talking about? The very suggestion—" {n}The Proctor's voice resounds with fury. His steely fingers dig into Glaito's collar.{/n} "You sick degenerate!"

languages.text: “你在说什么胡话？光是这种想法——”{n}索罗蒙的声音中充满了怒火，钢铁手指伸进了格雷托的项圈。{/n}“该死的异端渣滓！”
languages.original_text: "What are you talking about? The very suggestion—" {n}The Proctor's voice resounds with fury. His steely fingers dig into Glaito's collar.{/n} "You sick degenerate!"

traits.locale_text: “你在说什么胡话？光是这种想法——”{n}索罗蒙的声音中充满了怒火，钢铁手指伸进了格雷托的项圈。{/n}“该死的异端渣滓！”

languages.text: 「一体なんのことだ？なんて思わせぶりなんだ」{n}代理人の声が怒りを帯びて鳴り響く。彼の鋼のような指がグライトの首輪の中に入れられる。{/n}「堕落している！」
languages.original_text: "What are you talking about? The very suggestion—" {n}The Proctor's voice resounds with fury. His steely fingers dig into Glaito's collar.{/n} "You sick degenerate!"

traits.locale_text: 「一体なんのことだ？なんて思わせぶりなんだ」{n}代理人の声が怒りを帯びて鳴り響く。彼の鋼のような指がグライトの首輪の中に入れられる。{/n}「堕落している！」

languages.text: «¿Qué está diciendo? La mera sugerencia es...». {n}La voz del Procurador resuena henchida de furia. Sus dedos de acero se clavan en el collar de Glaito.{/n} «¡{mf|Maldito enfermo degenerado|Maldita enferma degenerada}!».
languages.original_text: "What are you talking about? The very suggestion—" {n}The Proctor's voice resounds with fury. His steely fingers dig into Glaito's collar.{/n} "You sick degenerate!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué está diciendo? La mera sugerencia es...». {n}La voz del Procurador resuena henchida de furia. Sus dedos de acero se clavan en el collar de Glaito.{/n} «¡{mf|Maldito enfermo degenerado|Maldita enferma degenerada}!».

languages.text: "Ne saçmalıyorsun sen? Böyle bir öneri bile..." {n}Üsteğmen'in sesi öfkeyle çınlıyor. Çelik gibi parmakları, Glaito'nun tasmasına gömülüyor.{/n} "Hastalıklı, soysuz herif!"
languages.original_text: "What are you talking about? The very suggestion—" {n}The Proctor's voice resounds with fury. His steely fingers dig into Glaito's collar.{/n} "You sick degenerate!"

traits.locale_text: "Ne saçmalıyorsun sen? Böyle bir öneri bile..." {n}Üsteğmen'in sesi öfkeyle çınlıyor. Çelik gibi parmakları, Glaito'nun tasmasına gömülüyor.{/n} "Hastalıklı, soysuz herif!"

languages.text: « Qu'est-ce que vous racontez ? La seule idée que... {n}La voix du proctor vibre de colère tandis que ses doigts d'acier agrippent le collier de Glaito.{/n} Maudit dégénéré ! »
languages.original_text: "What are you talking about? The very suggestion—" {n}The Proctor's voice resounds with fury. His steely fingers dig into Glaito's collar.{/n} "You sick degenerate!"

traits.locale_text: « Qu'est-ce que vous racontez ? La seule idée que... {n}La voix du proctor vibre de colère tandis que ses doigts d'acier agrippent le collier de Glaito.{/n} Maudit dégénéré ! »

languages.text: "Was redet Ihr da? Alleine die Vorstellung ..." {n}Die Stimme des Proktors ist zornerfüllt. Seine Stahlfinger umschließen Glaitos Halsband.{/n} "Ihr seid krank und degeneriert!"
languages.original_text: "What are you talking about? The very suggestion—" {n}The Proctor's voice resounds with fury. His steely fingers dig into Glaito's collar.{/n} "You sick degenerate!"

traits.locale_text: "Was redet Ihr da? Alleine die Vorstellung ..." {n}Die Stimme des Proktors ist zornerfüllt. Seine Stahlfinger umschließen Glaitos Halsband.{/n} "Ihr seid krank und degeneriert!"
